$interpreted: Puggi: So your name is Pang? I'm Puggi! How old are you why are you here where did you come from...
Puggi: ... What's your favorite food why are you so ugly do you have a girlfriend why do you look so much like a tiger...

Pang: Enough! How long do you plan to follow me?
Please leave!!
Puggi: Aww, come on~ you don't have to be embarrassed. I know you're intimidated by my protagonistic aura.
Puggi: Even so, I am very willing to let you be my friend.
Pang: I am more than capable of protecting myself. I don't need any friends!

Puggi: That doesn't mean you don't need friends~
Plus, I have a special ability up my sleeves.
Puggi: I guarantee you it will help us greatly in our journeys.
Pang: What special ability?
Puggi: Hehe~ the ability to find fun in everything!
Puggi: Hey, don't walk away so fast. Give me a chance to show you what I can do.
Puggi: Lemme see~ Aha! I sense fun coming from that side. Quick, follow me and check it out!
Puggi: Outta my way! Puggi is coming through!
Puggi: Come on man~ pick up the speed. Fun is right ahead!
Pang: Is the "Fun" you mentioned the horde of creatures right behind you?
Puggi: What, your kids are the ones to blame for getting in my way. Oh, so now I'm the bad guy, am I?
Puggi: Lemme tell you, I'm not scared of you! Come at me, you little wimp!
Puggi: What are you waiting for? Come and get some!
Pang: Sighs...
Puggi: Man, you took action way too early. I was going to take care of him myself. Well, guess that's for the best; he'd be total dead meat if I did it myself...
Puggi: ... Ehhh, you don't have to walk so fast!

Pang: I'm used to being by myself. I don't need friends.
Get lost.
Puggi: Bro, judging by your super~ grumpy tone and uber ugly face, its' not that you don't need friends, more like you can't make friends?
Puggi: Hey, so how many people do you have in your family what are you hobbies what color do you like I personally prefer white...
Pang: SIGHS~ Give me a break~

Model.Text: So your name is Pang? I'm Puggi! How old are you why are you here where did you come from...
... What's your favorite food why are you so ugly do you have a girlfriend why do you look so much like a tiger...

Enough! How long do you plan to follow me?
Please leave!!
Aww, come on~ you don't have to be embarrassed. I know you're intimidated by my protagonistic aura.
Even so, I am very willing to let you be my friend.
I am more than capable of protecting myself. I don't need any friends!

That doesn't mean you don't need friends~
Plus, I have a special ability up my sleeves.
I guarantee you it will help us greatly in our journeys.
What special ability?
Hehe~ the ability to find fun in everything!
Hey, don't walk away so fast. Give me a chance to show you what I can do.
Lemme see~ Aha! I sense fun coming from that side. Quick, follow me and check it out!
Outta my way! Puggi is coming through!
Come on man~ pick up the speed. Fun is right ahead!
Is the "Fun" you mentioned the horde of creatures right behind you?
What, your kids are the ones to blame for getting in my way. Oh, so now I'm the bad guy, am I?
Lemme tell you, I'm not scared of you! Come at me, you little wimp!
What are you waiting for? Come and get some!
Sighs...
Man, you took action way too early. I was going to take care of him myself. Well, guess that's for the best; he'd be total dead meat if I did it myself...
... Ehhh, you don't have to walk so fast!

I'm used to being by myself. I don't need friends.
Get lost.
Bro, judging by your super~ grumpy tone and uber ugly face, its' not that you don't need friends, more like you can't make friends?
Hey, so how many people do you have in your family what are you hobbies what color do you like I personally prefer white...
SIGHS~ Give me a break~
